description: While active, grants the Avian's Might and Avian's Flight buffs in sequence. Avian's Might grants you and your minions a chance to deal Double Damage with hits for a duration. Avian's Flight grants you and your minions increased Movement Speed for a secondary duration.
static.name: Aspect of the Avian

stats.text: Minions gain {0}% chance to deal Double Damage

description: Repeatedly strike at enemies in a circle in front of you while channelling, dealing damage to and around the struck enemy. The damage is continually boosted while channelling. You unleash an additional strike for each stage reached once the channelling ends. Requires a Dagger, Claw or One-Handed Sword.
static.name: Blade Flurry

stats.text: {0}% more Damage with Hits and Ailments for each stage

description: Casts an aura that grants mana regeneration to you and your allies.
static.name: Clarity

stats.text: You and nearby allies regenerate {0} Mana per second

description: Each attack with this skill will choose an element at random, and will only be able to deal damage of that element. If the attack hits an enemy, it will also deal damage in an area around them, with the radius being larger if that enemy is suffering from an ailment of the chosen element. It will avoid choosing the same element twice in a row.
static.name: Elemental Hit
properties: Attack, Melee, Fire, Cold, Lightning, AoE, Bow

description: Release a lightning charged spinning copy of your weapon or its projectiles that rotates around a point, damaging enemies in an area.
static.name: Commandment of Ire

stats.text: {0}% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
You cannot use this Attack directly

description: Summons a totem that fires a stream of flame at nearby enemies.
static.name: Flame Totem

stats.text: Summons a Totem which uses this Skill

description: Lays a remote mine that you can detonate to freeze all enemies in the area.
static.name: Freeze Mine

stats.text: Enemies lose {0}% Cold Resistance while Frozen
Freezes enemies as though dealing {0}% more Damage
Places a Remote Mine which uses this Skill when detonated

description: Performs a warcry, granting the user and nearby allies increased attack speed if there are nearby enemies. The attack speed increase is proportional to the number of surrounding enemies. Taunts all nearby enemies to attack the user, and Intimidates them. Shares a cooldown with other Warcry skills.
static.name: Intimidating Cry

stats.text: {0}% increased Attack Speed per one hundred nearby Enemies

description: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
static.name: Phase Run

stats.text: {0}% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge

description: Fires multiple arrows into the air, to land in sequence after a delay, starting at the targeted location and spreading outwards in all directions. Each arrow deals damage in an area around it. Half of the arrows will land directly on targets if there are targets in their range.
static.name: Rain of Arrows

description: Makes you immune to physical damage, and harder for enemies to detect, for a duration.
static.name: Shade Form

stats.text: {0}% chance to Trigger this Spell when you Use a Skill Socketed in your Body Armour

description: Throws a spectral copy of your shield as a projectile which cannot pierce, and deals off-hand damage augmented by the defences of the shield. When it collides with something it will shatter, launching a number of smaller shards as projectiles in all directions. Modifiers that cause additional projectiles to be fired will add more shards, not more copies of the shield.
static.name: Spectral Shield Throw

description: Throws multiple traps that explode when triggered, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies and leaving areas of burning ground that damages enemies who walk through them.
static.name: Vaal FireTrap

description: Fires your wand simultaneously at all nearby enemies, culling those close to death and granting you a power charge for each. Cannot be supported by Volley.
static.name: Vaal Power Siphon

stats.text: Gain a Power Charge when Projectile Hits a Rare or Unique Enemy

description: Sacrifices a portion of your Life and Energy Shield to engulf you in magical fire that rapidly burns nearby enemies for a duration. Your spell damage is substantially increased while under this effect.
static.name: Vaal Righteous Fire
